detail_desc: Sleeveless blouse in a cotton weave with embroidery. Opening and ties at the back of the neck and a frill trim around the neckline and armholes.

Cropped sports top in fast-drying functional fabric designed with the minimum number of seams for a more comfortable fit and increased mobility. Narrow, adjustable shoulder straps. Integral bra with removable inserts that shape the bust and provide good support, and covered elastication at the hem.
Padded Alice band covered with rhinestones and plastic beads.
Joggers in soft cotton sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated, drawstring waist, pockets and ribbed hems.
Briefs in printed cotton jersey with a lined gusset.
Skinny-fit, ankle-length trousers in washed stretch twill with hard-worn details. Adjustable elasticated waist, zip fly and press-stud, fake front pockets, real back pockets and raw-edge hems.
Short, fitted, rib-knit top with a deep V-neck, zip at the top and short sleeves.
Boxer shorts in a cotton weave with an elasticated waist, long legs and button fly.
Wedge-heel sandals with narrow straps in imitation suede. Double ankle strap with an adjustable metal buckle, and a braided jute trim around the soles. Heel 7 cm, platform front 1.5 cm.
Smartphone case in soft silicone with a heart-shaped metal decoration at the top. Fits iPhone 6/6s/7/8.
V-neck vest top in soft slub jersey made from a cotton and modal blend in a slightly shorter, flared style.
Lace thong briefs with a mid waist, lined gusset, wide sides and string back.
Long-sleeved, polo-neck jumper in a soft, rib-knit wool blend containing some cashmere.

Set with a long-sleeved, hooded jacket and pair of trousers in organic cotton jersey. Jacket with a jersey-lined hood, zip down the front with a chin guard, side pockets and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Trousers with ribbing at the waist and hems.

Shirt woven in a stretch cotton blend with a narrow turn-down collar, long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs, darts at the back, and a rounded hem. Slim fit with narrow shoulders and a tapered waist to create a fitted silhouette.
Wrapover blouse in a viscose weave with a check pattern, V-neck, sewn-in wrapover, short sleeves with frilled cuffs and an elasticated seam at the waist.
Gently flared dress in glittery tulle with an opening and button at the back of the neck, gathers at the top and short, butterfly sleeves. Satin lining.
5-pocket trousers in imitation leather with a regular waist and slim legs.
Long-sleeved playsuit in sequined, glittery jersey with a deep V-neck and draped detail at the front. Seam at the waist that is elasticated at the back, and short, wide legs.
Short, high-waisted, pleated skirt in woven fabric with a press-stud and concealed zip at one side. Unlined.
Velour soft toy with embroidered appliqués and a removable monster costume. Polyester filling. Length approx. 22 cm.
Jacket in sweatshirt fabric with a lined drawstring hood, zip down the front, side pockets and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
5-pocket slim-fit jeans in washed stretch denim with an adjustable elasticated waist, zip fly and worn details.
Sleeveless body in jersey with a print motif on the front, a deep neckline front and back, and press-studs at the crotch.
Long-sleeved jersey top with lace at the back. Open section at the back with a button at the back of the neck.
Dress in an airy cotton weave with an embroidered yoke at the front, buttons at the back of the neck, flutter sleeves and a flare to the hem.

Calf-length dress in a patterned crêpe weave with a round neckline and an opening with a button at the back of the neck. Long, wide sleeves with buttoned cuffs, a seam at the waist and an asymmetric skirt with a slit at the front. Unlined.
Playsuit in soft jersey with broderie anglaise. V-neck, narrow shoulder straps, an elasticated, gathered seam at the waist and short, wide legs. Lined at the bottom.
Straight-cut T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with a narrow, ribbed trim around the neckline.
T-shirt in soft, printed cotton jersey.
Kangol x H&M. Oversized jumper in a soft, wide rib knit containing some wool with a fuzzy finish. Round neckline, dropped shoulders, long sleeves and a large Kangol logo above the hem.

prod_name: Mini me LOGG Alps jac. Dress
detail_desc: Dress in a soft jacquard knit with long raglan sleeves, and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.

Relaxed-fit joggers in stretch cotton twill with a lightly brushed finish. Elasticated drawstring waist, a fake fly, side pockets and jetted back pockets. Slightly lower crotch and tapered legs with ribbing at the hems.
Long-sleeved jumper in soft, rib-knit cashmere with a small, ribbed stand-up collar, wide sewn-in turn-ups at the cuffs, and slits in the sides.

Fully lined sports bralette in ribbed microfibre with wide ribbing at the hem and lined cups with removable inserts that shape the bust. The bralette is designed with the minimum number of seams for a more comfortable fit and increased mobility. Light support.

Padded jacket in woven fabric with a sheen. Stand-up collar, zip down the front, side pockets with a concealed zip and a zipped inner pocket. Small elasticated trims in a contrasting colour at the cuffs. Polyester filling. Partly lined.

Short, boxy jacket in woven fabric with a lined, drawstring hood, high collar and zip down the front. Flap front pockets with a press-stud, long sleeves with covered elastication at the cuffs, and a drawstring at the hem. Lined.

Oversized shirt jacket in washed cotton denim with a collar, buttons down the front and yoke at the back. Flap chest pockets with a button and side pockets. Dropped shoulders, long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem.
Leggings in stretch jersey with a denim look. Elasticated waist, fake front pockets and real back pockets.
Glittery hi-tops with a hook and loop tab and elasticated lacing. Mesh linings and insoles and fluted soles.

Short, off-the-shoulder dress in an airy, plumeti weave with elastication and a small frill trim at the top. Long sleeves with elastication at the cuffs, an elasticated seam at the waist and a flounce at the hem. Partly lined.
Blouse in a crêpe weave with a V-neck front and back with ties at the back of the neck and long trumpet sleeves.

Shirt in soft, checked cotton flannel with a button-down collar, classic front, open chest pocket and yoke with a pleat and hanger at the back. Long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs and a sleeve placket with a link button. Rounded hem, slightly longer at the back.
Metal rings in various designs. Five decorated with a stone-look plastic bead.
Baby Exclusive. Shorts in a textured organic cotton weave with elastication and a tie belt at the waist, and side pockets.
5-pocket ankle-length jeans in washed denim with a high waist, button fly and slim legs with sparkly stones at the front.
Short, V-neck dress in an airy, crinkled weave with a flounce-trimmed neckline, short butterfly sleeves and an elasticated seam at the waist. Lined.
Maxi skirt in a patterned viscose weave with a concealed zip in one side and flare to the hem. Unlined.
Short-sleeved sports top in fast-drying functional fabric.

Lightly padded puffer jacket in a quilted weave made from recycled polyester. Detachable hood with concealed press-studs, a zip down the front with a chin guard, and discreet pockets in the side seams. Narrow elastication around the hood and cuffs. Lined.
Fine-knit trainer socks in fast-drying functional fabric.
Scarf in a soft weave with fringes along the short sides. Size 50x180 cm.

Short, boxy jacket in sturdy, textured jersey with a collar, concealed press-studs down the front and a tab with press-studs at the hem. Large flap chest pockets with a press-stud, dropped shoulders and long sleeves with buttoned cuffs. Unlined.
Sleeveless jumpsuit in a viscose weave with a smocked bodice, wide, tie-top shoulder straps, regular waist and wide, straight legs. Unlined.
Jersey vest top in a cotton blend with raw edges around the neckline and armholes.
Sports top in fast-drying functional fabric with a stand-up collar, zip at the top, long raglan sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.

Short, fitted skirt in velvet made from recycled polyester with draping, a concealed zip in one side made partly from recycled polyester and a wide, slightly asymmetric flounce at the hem. Recycled polyester lining.
Short skirt in a sturdy jacquard weave with a concealed zip at the back. Lined.
Slim-fit trousers in stretch cotton twill with an adjustable elasticated waist, zip fly and button, fake front pockets, real back pockets and narrow hems.
Short dress in a crêpe weave with a collar, buttons down the front and gathered yoke at the back. Long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem. Unlined.
Trunks in stretch cotton jersey with flatlock seams, short legs, an elasticated waist and a lined front.

Set with a top and trousers in soft, printed sweatshirt fabric. Top with long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Trousers with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and ribbed hems. Soft brushed inside.

Long-sleeved top in soft sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend. Jersey-lined hood with a wrapover front, and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside. The cotton content of the top is organic.
Short-sleeved polo shirt in cotton piqué with a ribbed collar, button placket, small embroidery detail on the chest and short slits in the sides. Slightly longer at the back.
Striped top in soft organic cotton jersey with a round neck and long sleeves.
Lace bra with underwired, moulded, lightly padded cups that shape the bust and provide good support. Wide, adjustable shoulder straps and a fastening at the back with three pairs of hooks and eyes.
Joggers in a soft, fine knit containing some wool. Regular waist with covered elastication and a drawstring, side pockets and tapered legs with short slits at the hems.

Lightly padded bomber jacket in woven fabric with a slight sheen. Zip down the front, flap side pockets with a press-stud and gathered seams at the back and under the arms. Ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Lined.
Tops in cotton jersey with narrow shoulder straps.
Skirts in soft organic cotton jersey with an elasticated waist.

Top in soft sweatshirt fabric with a lined drawstring hood, kangaroo pocket, zipped pocket on one sleeve and ribbing around the cuffs and hem. Muscle fit – a fit designed to showcase the physique. Narrow shoulders and tapered sleeves create a flattering silhouette.

Calf-length dress in a viscose weave with a V-neck, notch lapels and concealed buttons down the front. Long sleeves with gentle gathers and buttoned cuffs. Detachable belt with metal D-rings. Unlined.
Top in sweatshirt fabric with print motif on the front, a jersey-lined hood and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Padded jacket with a stand-up collar, zip and wind flap with concealed press-studs down the front, side pockets and a drawstring at the hem. Lined. Filling 80% down and 20% feathers.
Short, long-sleeved dress in sturdy jersey with a small stand-up collar, concealed zip at the back, seam at the waist and flared skirt.

Hoodie in soft sweatshirt fabric with an interactive appliqué on the front and jersey-lined, wrapover hood. Gently dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Short top in airy ribbed jersey with long sleeves and narrow elastication with gathers in the sides.
Ribbed jumper in a soft, coated cotton blend in a wide, straight style with long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Jacket in soft sweatshirt fabric with a hood, zip down the front, front pockets and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Sports shorts in fast-drying, breathable functional fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist and zipped side pockets. Unlined.
